author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Banque Cantonale Vaudoise FY Net Profit Up 3 Pct At CHF 320 Million
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Banque Cantonale Vaudoise:
* FY 2017 OPERATING PROFIT INCREASED 1% TO CHF 387M, AND NET PROFIT ROSE 3% TO CHF 320M
* BOARD OF DIRECTORS WILL PROPOSE AN ORDINARY DIVIDEND OF CHF 23 PER SHARE AND A SPECIAL DISTRIBUTION OF CHF 10 PER SHARE OUT OF PAID-IN RESERVES
* FY TOTAL REVENUES WERE STABLE AT CHF 967M * FY 2018 RESULTS ARE EXPECTED TO TREND ALONG THE SAME LINES AS IN PRIOR YEARS
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
